head.title: Linda Eve Sedloff and Graham Orton

hedline.hl1: Linda Eve Sedloff and Graham Orton

block.p: Linda Eve Sedloff, the business development officer in New York for the London law firm of Clifford Chance, and Graham Stewart Orton, a corporate recovery analyst for Standard Charter Bank in London, have announced September wedding plans.
Ms. Sedloff, 26 years old, graduated from the University of Chicago. She is the daughter of Rhoda Sedloff of Forest Hills, Queens, and the late Harold Sedloff.

Linda Eve Sedloff, the business development officer in New York for the London law firm of Clifford Chance, and Graham Stewart Orton, a corporate recovery analyst for Standard Charter Bank in London, have announced September wedding plans.
Ms. Sedloff, 26 years old, graduated from the University of Chicago. She is the daughter of Rhoda Sedloff of Forest Hills, Queens, and the late Harold Sedloff.
Mr. Orton, 25, graduated from Oxford University. He is the son of Brian and Beryl Orton of Bristol, England.
